title: Champions that you refuse to play and support
body:
What are some champions that you refuse to play souly because you hate their kit, play style, and you don't support them at all.

Personally you'll never see me pick up {{champion:238}}  {{champion:23}}  {{champion:64}} or {{champion:157}} . I hate everything about these champions and I will never play them.
